content: new version of pdf should be error free old version still available but should not be used please let me know if you have any questions or find any errors in this pattern this long dress is worked from the bottom up and it is easy to make **you can make it as long or short as you want** but the best thing is that it is almost ready to wear after casting off another thing about it is that it can be used for years my daughter has been wearing hers since she was 3 and she is 5 now so the length helps it to last longer i had to try this self striped yarn it is cewec s silver dream and is 100% acrylic i however do love using wool but my daughter loves the colors and does not mind it is not wool if made with wool it will be a nice and warm dress to wear
